Pros.title: Course benefits
Pros.item4: Material can be mastered in less than an hour
Pros.item5: 80% of the material is practical actions: take and repeat

question1.title: Where will the training take place?
question1.answer: In a private Telegram channel, accessible 24/7 from any device. No Zoom calls or time constraints - learn at your own pace.

question2.title: What happens after purchasing the course?
question2.answer: You instantly receive a personal access link to the private community. All materials and bonuses become available immediately.

question3.title: How long is the course?
question3.answer: Just ~60 minutes of concentrated knowledge without fluff. Only what really works and brings results.

question4.title: How long will I have access to the materials?
question4.answer: Lifetime access to the course and all future updates.

question5.title: When can I start learning?
question5.answer: Immediately after payment - no waiting for course starts or group formation.

question6.title: Is this course suitable for complete beginners?
question6.answer: Perfect fit! The course starts from zero and explains even complex topics in simple language. We consider that many are hearing about cryptocurrency for the first time.

question7.title: Is it worth taking if I've already traded crypto?
question7.answer: Absolutely yes. You'll learn professional traders' strategies that aren't shared in public.

question8.title: What amount can I start with?
question8.answer: You can start with $1. Moreover, beginners get a bonus - the opportunity to receive their first cryptocurrency for free right after registration.

question9.title: Do I need a computer for learning?
question9.answer: No, all operations can be performed from a smartphone. In the course, we show every action in detail specifically from a mobile phone.

question10.title: How soon will I see first results?
question10.answer: You can register, buy your first coin, and form a portfolio on day one. As for profits, 78% of our students made gains in their first week of actively applying the knowledge.

question11.title: How much time should I dedicate to learning?
question11.answer: For maximum results, 15-20 minutes per day is sufficient. Moreover, you can complete the ENTIRE course in one hour. You can go through the materials at your own pace, combining learning with other activities.

question12.title: What skills will I gain after the course?
question12.answer: You'll learn to safely work with exchanges, select promising coins, apply working earning strategies, and withdraw profits in any convenient way without extra fees.

question13.title: Why buy the course when there's lots of free information online?
question13.answer: There's a lot of contradictory, outdated, and dangerous information online. Our course is a proven roadmap that will save you from costly mistakes and reduce your learning curve from months of self-study to just one hour.

Hero.title: Quick Start in Crypto
Hero.colorText: From zero to understanding and first steps in 60 minutes
Hero.description: A simple and fast course of 8 short lessons, created specifically for beginners. No fluff, complex terms, or overload — just what you need to understand how crypto works in 1 hour.

About.title: Speaker
About.subtitle: My name is
About.description: — I am a crypto expert with over 5 years of market experience. During this time, I've helped more than 100 people start earning with cryptocurrency. In my course, I share proven strategies that have helped my students achieve success.
